body_text:
When an unknown error happens, currently we give a generic error message like "Could not save recipe", with no other details. This can happen because if server error, a bug in th code, or permission denied/unauthorized responses.
Directing users to read the network panel (as I have been doing) isn't really sustainable. We should have details for every error available in the UI.
It would also be nice to have a smarter error than "Could not save recipe". This issue covers making the full response from on the server available by expanding the error message in case of error.
